title: aatrox needs a buff
body: personally think aatrox isn't played much now due to the fact that he's so easily destroyed his damaged isn't so great nor is his durability. compare aatrox to a tryn riven, fiora  j4 poppy irelia  shyvana etc, who have the equal amount of gold aatrox never seem to wins unless he is way way way ahead even in the early game like in his laning phase where he is ment to be at an advantage

fid not fine he is so underpowered and he basically has 1 ability its called drain

Fiddlesticks isn't underpowered, he's underplayed. Try playing Fiddlesticks mid, once you hit 6 you can hide behind a wall and 100-0 any mid laner with 0 retaliation (ult, E for silence, wait 1 second for ult to damage while walking towards him, click fear + drain for the kill). Very few mid laners can escape or fight back.

Even in his more traditional role (jungle) he does fine. Check out his stats, his win rate is really high this patch. His ult is what makes him strong, not his drain. His fear + silence is really powerful, too.

Don't be arrogant. You're only Gold, you still barely know anything about the game. Aatrox can build tanky and still deal a fuckload of damage, just like Xin (more damage, less CC). He's also strong as a bruiser-fighter, just like Xin. Is he outclassed by some other champs? Probably, yes. Is he weak? Hell no. If he got buffed he'd be permaban status in high Elo since the people who are good at Aatrox CRUSH games. There's no good Aatrox players in low (Plat or lower) Elo.
can I ask why do you smurf iv never understood why you would get enjoyment out of crushing low elo players.

I don't, and I hate smurfs who do that (especially smurfs who intentionally lose placement matches to get to lower Elo). I use this account for three reasons:

1. To practice champions I'm bad at or test out unusual builds
2. To play "fun" builds that wouldn't work in higher Elo
3. As something to play on when I have to dodge on my main

If you look at my match history, most of the time I'm not crushing my games. It's mostly Shaco (which I suck at), and a lot of the Shaco games are with AP builds.

If you check my MMR history, you'll see that this account was placed straight into Gold because I didn't want to play in the lowest Elo tiers.

Aatrox doesn't need a buff or rework, maybe some tweaks to his existing kit but that's it. Right now in the right hands he absolutely crushes just about any team so long as he's properly built and backed up by his team.

Aatrox needs a better E and perhaps a better Ult and he will be fine.

I enjoy Aatrox jungle sometimes. Top lane I think he is extremely weak though compared to most current meta top laners.

Imo Aatrox is pretty strong and doesn't need any buffs but he needs a rework because his kit is just terrible and he doesn't provide much to the team and the only way for him to be useful is to splitpush.
